content: **knitted jumper in drops air the piece is worked bottom up with lace pattern split in the sides and high neck sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-403 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 300-350-350-400-450-500 g colour 30 sage green needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
